body.p:
Madison Circuit Court
The Commonwealth
Against } Indict for Carry Con Weapon
Stockwell Clark

W M Stone says that at the December Term 1860 of the Madison Circuit Court the defendant Stockwell Clark was indicted for carrying a concealed weapon and then upon a bench warrant was issued and that he became his surety in the sum of $100 for his appearance &c
He says that the deft did at all times when required attend to answser said charge until the June term 1862, at which time failing to appear a forfeiture of his bond was entered
The case was continued from time to time by the commonwealth, the deft always appearing in obedience to the process in this case till the time aforesaid stated

He further says that about the 15th day of April 1862 the said deft without his knowledge or consent & so far as this matter relates to him without against his consent wishes left the county of Madison & state of Kentucky for the state of Massachusetts & that at the date of departure from said county & state he Stone was living in the town of Barboursville Ky some seventy five miles distant from this point & had been residing there since the middle of January 1862 & that he did not return till the 1st of August of thereabouts 1862 --

He states that an account of his Stones absence aforesaid he had no knowledge of the departure of said Clark & could not therefore take any steps to prevent it He is perfectly willing that the case should be tried & is willing to abide by the Judgment of the court if the case should go against said Clark
He says the forfeiture is rather "tight" upon him & he asks your excellency to remit the same
W M Stone says the statements in the foregoing paper are true

p.hi: J M Shackelford C M C C

body.p: We the undersigned citizens of Madison County would respectfully unite in the petition of W M Stone --

J. W. Caperton
Will J Walker
Giles Rody
C. F. Burnam
E. H. Fields
D Breck
R. G. Burton
W. McClanahan
E L Shackelford

Madison Cir. Ct
The Commonwealth
vs } Petition & affidavit of W M Stone
Stockwell Clark Jr
$100. } For.
The forfeiture in this case is remitted
J F Robinson
W. M Stone
Issd June 13. 1863
